articles.title: Galaxy S21 (S30) may have hidden selfie camera, as Visionox starts mass under-display production - PhoneArena
articles.description: Can the release of the first phone with under-screen front camera be near? Visionox thinks so, and Snapdragon 875 phones (cue Galaxy S21) may also have one.
articles.content: Chinas display manufacturers, Visionox, has just announced the worlds first mass-produced under-display camera solution. The worlds first under-display camera phone will be released. pic.twitter.com/… [+52 chars]
